verses.name: 1 Samuel 23:19
verses.text: Then came up the Ziphites to Saul to Gibeah, saying, Doth not David hide himself with us in strong holds in the wood, in the hill of Hachilah, which is on the south of Jeshimon?

verses.name: 1 Samuel 23:20
verses.text: Now therefore, O king, come down according to all the desire of thy soul to come down; and our part shall be to deliver him into the king’s hand.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 23:21
verses.text: And Saul said, Blessed be ye of the Lord; for ye have compassion on me.
